CustomField.description: This is used for drill down.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK( vlocity_ins__PrimaryPartyId__r.vlocity_ins__AccountId__r.Id ), HYPERLINK("/" & vlocity_ins__PrimaryPartyId__r.vlocity_ins__ContactId__r.Id , vlocity_ins__PrimaryPartyId__r.Name , "_parent"), HYPERLINK("/" & vlocity_ins__PrimaryPartyId__r.vlocity_ins__AccountId__r.Id, vlocity_ins__PrimaryPartyId__r.Name , "_parent"))
CustomField.label: Applicant Name
